DOC.brief_summary: A prospective single-arm well-controlled study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of a less invasive means of establishing vascular access to facilitate dialysis in patients with end stage renal disease.
DOC.brief_title: Percutaneous Less Invasive AV Fistula for Vascular Access in ESRD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with end stage renal disease Prior ipsilateral vascular surgery mastectomy axillary lymphadenectomy
